entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is a friendly competition between three largest European schools of wizardry. It was established 700 years ago.

entities.name: harry potter and the methods of rational madness
entities.description: This book is not explicitly mentioned in the text but it is implied that this is a book being read by students in the hall.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is one of the three largest European schools of wizardry participating in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is another school participating in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is a third school participating in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students in the hall who seems to be alarmed by the mention of death toll.
